testimonial1.text: I'm very satisfied with the Mercedes GLC I purchased from AutoDrive. The customer service is excellent and the buying process was very convenient.
testimonial1.author: John Smith

testimonial2.text: The consulting team is very enthusiastic and professional. They helped me find the right car for my family's needs and budget.
testimonial2.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial3.text: The warranty and after-sales service of AutoDrive is truly impressive. I will continue to come back here for my next car purchase.
testimonial3.author: Michael Brown

about.title: About Us
about.description1: AutoDrive is a leading car dealership in Vietnam with over 15 years of experience in the automotive business.
about.description2: Founded in 2008, AutoDrive has quickly become one of the most reputable car dealerships in Vietnam. We are proud to be the official partner of many renowned car brands worldwide such as Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Audi, Toyota, Honda and many other car manufacturers.
about.description3: With a professional and dedicated team, we are committed to providing customers with high-quality products and perfect service, meeting all needs and expectations of customers.
about.missionText1: AutoDrive's mission is to provide customers with high-quality cars at reasonable prices, along with dedicated and professional customer care services.
about.missionText2: We are committed to accompanying customers throughout the car ownership process, from advising on choosing the right car to maintenance, warranty and after-sales services.
about.visionText1: AutoDrive aims to become the leading car dealership in Vietnam, trusted and chosen by customers when they need to buy a car.
about.visionText2: We continuously strive to improve service quality, expand our dealership network and diversify our product lines to best meet the needs of customers in the increasingly developing automotive market.

value1.title: Integrity
value1.description: We always put integrity first, committed to transparency and honesty in all transactions with customers.

value2.title: Quality
value2.description: We only provide products and services that meet the highest quality standards, ensuring customer satisfaction.

value3.title: Dedication
value3.description: Our team is always dedicated to serving, listening and responding to all customer needs.

about.learnMore: Want to learn more about AutoDrive?
about.contactUs: Contact us today for free consultation
